settings.name: hashing_algorithm
settings.description: Hashing algorithm used by Python background script

settings.name: python_limit
settings.description: Maximum number of python background scripts running

settings.name: exclude_list
settings.description: Global administrator's exclude list that applies to each task

settings.name: installed
settings.description: Installation data with current MediaDC configuration

settings.name: python_command
settings.description: Absolute path to the python runnable (e.g. "/usr/bin/python3"). Can be obtained by `which python3` command.

settings.name: remote_filesize_limit
settings.displayName: Remote/Encrypted file size limit to process
settings.description: Maximum file size for requesting from php core. Used when file hosts on remote NC instance or have encrypted flag. Must be less then total available RAM size.

settings.name: use_php_path_from_settings
settings.displayName: Use path to PHP interpreter for Python from settings
settings.description: Determine whether to use path from settings or detect it automatically (may not work with some unusual PHP install locations). Used in Python part.

settings.name: php_path
settings.displayName: Full path to PHP interpreter for Python
settings.description: Absolute path to the PHP executable (e.g. "/usr/bin/php7.4"). Can be obtained by `which php` or `which php7.4` command
